players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated him."
Charlie: "I have no information to share at this time."
You: "I have confirmed that Charlie is the mafioso. I will continue to investigate and gather more information."
Charlie: "I have no information to share at this time, but I am keeping an open mind and will continue to observe the situation closely."
Diana: "I will remain silent for now, but I'm keeping an eye on Alice's investigation. Let's see what happens next."
